title: error when creating a folder with name "data"
body:
the owncloud can not synchronize a folder with name "data". the access denied message is displayed in several log. i also tried to create the folder using remote.php / webdav but it still fails too. the error also occurs on the owncloud client. see the log below owncloud client.log 01-25 12:51:20:565 oc_module: stating directory owncloud://192.168.0.105/owncloud/remote.php/webdav/documents/data/ 01-25 12:51:20:565 oc_module: owncloud_stat owncloud://192.168.0.105/owncloud/remote.php/webdav/documents/data/ called 01-25 12:51:20:568 oc_module: request failed, don't take session header. 01-25 12:51:20:568 oc_module: neon error code was 1 01-25 12:51:20:568 oc_module: wrn: propfind named failed with 1, request error: 403 forbidden 01-25 12:51:20:569 oc_module: => errno after fetch resource list for owncloud://192.168.0.105/owncloud/remote.php/webdav/documents/data/default: 22 apache error_log fri jan 25 14:00:07 2013] [error] [client 192.168.0.104] client denied by server configuration: /opt/share/www/owncloud/remote.php apache access_log 192.168.0.104 - - [25/jan/2013:14:00:04 -0200] "mkcol /owncloud/remote.php/webdav/documents/data/ http/1.1" 403 277 in mac os shell $curl --insecure --user user:password --request mkcol http://192.168.0.105/owncloud/remote.php/webdav/documents/data/ 403 forbidden

forbidden

you don't have permission to access /owncloud/remote.php/webdav/documentos/data/ on this server.

owncloud 4.5.6 owncloud client version 1.2.0beta2 *** server iomega ix2-200 cloud edition firmware 3.2.6.21659 linux 2.6.31.8 armv5t4l apache /2.2.20 (unix) php 5.3.20 (cli) *** notebook mac os x 10.8.2 safari 6.0.2
